attributes.action: Invest more money in adequate materials to suitably fix pot holes in our roads
attributes.additional_details: They need to approve the spending and sourcing of materials to fix the issue as the holes are dangerous to drivers and cyclists across the whole country
attributes.background: Approve the increase in funding for roads and motorways to allow pot holes to be fixed with a more suitable material so they do not have to be fixed every time we have bad weather.
